executable.title: Airway segmentation
executable.description: Semi-automatically extracts the airway from a CT image.
executable.contributor: Marc Niethammer, Yi Hong, Johan Andruejol

parameters.label: Segmentation Seeds
parameters.description: Used for automatically leave the lungs out of the segmentation.

point.name: tracheaCarina
point.label: Trachea carina
point.description: Point placed at the carina of the trachea..

double.name: tracheaCarinaRadius
double.label: Trachea carina point's radius
double.description: The radius of the point placed at the trachea carina.

point.name: pyrinaAperture
point.label: Pyrina aperture
point.description: Point placed at the pyrina aperture.

double.name: pyrinaApertureRadius
double.label: Pyrina aperture point's radius
double.description: The radius of the ball placed at the pyrina aperture.

parameters.label: Advanced Settings
parameters.description: Adavanced settings. Default should be good enough for most purposes

double.name: dMaxAirwayRadius
double.label: Airway maximum radius
double.description: Maximal radius for morphological closing (in mm). Should be set roughly a little larger than the maximal expected radius for the airway.

double.name: dErodeDistance
double.label: Erosion distance
double.description: Erosion distance from estimate of the outer skin layer (in mm) to prevent leaking of the segmetnation out of the nose.

integer.name: iMaximumNumberOfCVIterations
integer.label: Maximum number of Chan Vese iterations.
integer.description: Maximum number of Chan Vese iterations (to smooth the final Otsu-thresholding result). If set to a negative value won't be used.

double.name: dCVLambda
double.label: Smoothing parameter for Chan Vese segmentation.
double.description: Smoothing parameter for Chan Vese segmentation. The larger the smoother.

integer.name: iComponent
integer.label: Airway manual label
integer.description: Use this to manualy choose the possible airway label. If the value is inferior to 0, it won't be used.

boolean.name: bNoWarning
boolean.label: Break on warning
boolean.description: Choose whether or not the execution stop if a warning is found.

boolean.name: bDebug
boolean.label: Output debug informations
boolean.description: Choose whether or not to output the debug informations and images.

string.name: sDebugFolder
string.label: Destination folder for debug images
string.description: Used only if Debug on. Choose the destination folder of the images.
